description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A randomly generated turn based adventure.  Become the Black Knight and explore the dungeons in search of your enchanted gear that has been taken from you.  A new adventure everytime you play.
description.short: A randomly generated turn based adventure.  Become the Black Knight and explore the dungeons in search of your enchanted gear that has been taken from you.  A new adventure everytime you play.
